tool_description: Generates properly formatted citations and bibliographies in various academic and professional citation styles.

sources.description: Source information (title, author, URL, date) for each citation

citation_style.description: Citation format: APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, IEEE, Vancouver

error_messages: Invalid citation style: Use one of [APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, IEEE, Vancouver]
Invalid output type: Use one of [inline, bibliography, both]
Empty sources array: Provide at least one source to format
Sources limit exceeded: Maximum 100 sources allowed per formatting session
Incomplete source information: Each source must include sufficient information for citation formatting
usage: Provide sources array and citation_style, optionally specify output_type. Returns formatted citations ready for use in content.

formatted_citations.description: Properly formatted citations for each source

inline_citations.description: In-text citation formats for each source

citation_errors.description: Any errors or missing information for incomplete citations
